name: Ember Online[LDJam46]
description:
You are a stick, now burn!

Explore an atmospheric island as a stick together with more sticks. Set yourself alight and add more sticks to keep the fires alive. Discover the hidden and not so hidden beauties within this wordless world. Enjoy an ambient relaxing experience as a stick until you meet your aesthetic fiery end.

Will you be an explorer discovering every little secret, or will you conquer all challenges you may face as a simple piece of wood?

Credit:

Dev- Jared Brandjes, Jonathan Bala 3D- Nadia du Preez, Christopher Fourie, Chris Solomon, Alister Heyns Sound Design- Joshua Shneier, Bronwin Henn Spider- Willem Willemse
